original: @82b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @82b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: gu hya ratna /
analyzed: gu hya ratna /
translated: Guhyaratna

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: gsang ba rin po che //
analyzed: gsang ba rin po che //
translated: Secret Jewel

original: dpal bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Cakrasaṃvara

original: dang po re zhig rnal 'byor bas /
analyzed: dang po re zhig rnal 'byor bas /
translated: First, the practitioner

original: dur khrod la sogs par stan bde ba la 'dug ste kha lto phyogs su bltas nas /
analyzed: dur khrod la sogs par stan bde ba la 'dug ste kha lto phyogs su bltas nas /
translated: sits on a comfortable seat in a charnel ground, facing east,

original: 'gro ba thams cad bde chen zung 'jug thob par bya ba'i bsam pa sngon du 'gro bas /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad bde chen zung 'jug thob par bya ba'i bsam pa sngon du 'gro bas /
translated: and with the thought of causing all beings to attain the great bliss of union,

original: mdun du bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa dang lhag pa'i lha bltas la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: mdun du bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa dang lhag pa'i lha bltas la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
translated: they should supplicate the guru Vajradhara and the supreme deity in front.

original: de nas @83a * //
analyzed: de nas @83a * //
translated: Then,

original: mi snang bar gyur to //
analyzed: mi snang bar gyur to //
translated: they disappeared.

original: de'i ngang las bdag nyid kyi spyi bor aa las bskyed pa'i steng du ham yig nag po las 'od zer 'phros pa las rdo rje /
analyzed: de'i ngang las bdag nyid kyi spyi bor aa las bskyed pa'i steng du ham yig nag po las 'od zer 'phros pa las rdo rje /
translated: From that state, on one's crown generated from an A, above a black HAM syllable, light rays radiate and from that a vajra,

original: de las bde mchog yab yum gnyis su med par 'khril ba'i lha'i sku 'ja' tshon nam /
analyzed: de las bde mchog yab yum gnyis su med par 'khril ba'i lha'i sku 'ja' tshon nam /
translated: from that a Cakrasaṃvara couple in union, the deity's form like a rainbow or

original: chu zla shar ba lta bu'i sgyu ma'i rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: chu zla shar ba lta bu'i sgyu ma'i rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: an appearing moon in water, one should meditate on the form of an illusion.

original: de la rang gis mchod pa rnam pa lnga spros la dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la rang gis mchod pa rnam pa lnga spros la dbul bar bya'o //
translated: One should offer the five types of offerings that one emanates to that.

original: de nas gsol ba gdab pa ni //
analyzed: de nas gsol ba gdab pa ni //
translated: Then, the supplication:

original: bde chen dpal gyi mgon po yis //
analyzed: bde chen dpal gyi mgon po yis //
translated: The protector of great bliss

original: sangs rgyas skyob pa ji lta bar //
analyzed: sangs rgyas skyob pa ji lta bar //
translated: is like the Buddha, the protector.

original: dag pa'i de nyid ston mdzad pa //
analyzed: dag pa'i de nyid ston mdzad pa //
translated: The teacher of the reality of purity

original: di ring bdag la mgon dgyes mdzod//
analyzed: di ring bdag la mgon dgyes mdzod//
translated: is pleased with me today.

original: ces gsol ba btab pas yab yum gyi sbyor mtshams nas byang chub kyi sems dkar dmar bab pas rtsa gsum la brgyud cing /
analyzed: ces gsol ba btab pas yab yum gyi sbyor mtshams nas byang chub kyi sems dkar dmar bab pas rtsa gsum la brgyud cing /
translated: Since one makes this supplication, the white and red bodhicitta falls from the place of union of the father and mother, passing through the three channels.

original: lus dang ngag dang yid dag par byas nas lus bde ba'i rang bzhin du gsal ba'o //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang yid dag par byas nas lus bde ba'i rang bzhin du gsal ba'o //
translated: After the body, voice, and mind are purified, the body is visualized as the nature of bliss.

original: lte bar gtum mo spar ba yis //
analyzed: lte bar gtum mo spar ba yis //
translated: The caṇḍālī fire is ignited at the navel,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs te //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs te //
translated: burning the five tathāgatas,

original: spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs nas //
analyzed: spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs nas //
translated: and also burning Locanā, and so on.

original: ham las bdud rtsi zla rgyun 'bab //
analyzed: ham las bdud rtsi zla rgyun 'bab //
translated: The stream of lunar elixir falls from haṃ.

original: rten dang brten pa mnyam ldan pas //
analyzed: rten dang brten pa mnyam ldan pas //
translated: The support and the supported are combined

original: gcig tu zhu zhing bde ba che //
analyzed: gcig tu zhu zhing bde ba che //
translated: into a single taste, great bliss.

original: rnal 'byor ma yi da ma ru //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi da ma ru //
translated: The yoginī’s da-ru

original: sgra yis bskul gyur bzhengs par bya //
analyzed: sgra yis bskul gyur bzhengs par bya //
translated: is aroused by sound.

original: padma nyi ma'i gdan steng na //
analyzed: padma nyi ma'i gdan steng na //
translated: On a seat of lotus and sun,

original: zhal gcig phyag gnyis brkyang bskum tshul //
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag gnyis brkyang bskum tshul //
translated: with one face, two hands, in the posture of extended and contracted,

original: rdo rje dril bu lag na thogs //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu lag na thogs //
translated: holding a vajra and a bell,

original: sku ni beed'u rya'i rang bzhin //
analyzed: sku ni beed'u rya'i rang bzhin //
translated: his body the nature of beryl,

original: phyag rgya drug gis spras pa'i sku //
analyzed: phyag rgya drug gis spras pa'i sku //
translated: his body adorned with the six mudras,

original: 'od zer 'bar ba zla tshes dang // yid bzhin nor bu dbu la 'jog /'jigs byed chung mar bcas pa mnan //
analyzed: 'od zer 'bar ba zla tshes dang // yid bzhin nor bu dbu la 'jog /'jigs byed chung mar bcas pa mnan //
translated: with blazing light-rays, a crescent moon, and a wish-fulfilling gem placed on his head, trampling on Bhairava and his consort.

original: rdo rje phag mo zhal gcig ma //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo zhal gcig ma //
translated: Vajravārāhī has one face

original: phyag gnyis kyis ni yab la 'khyud //
analyzed: phyag gnyis kyis ni yab la 'khyud //
translated: and two hands embracing the father,

original: rdo rje dang ni thod pa 'dzin //
analyzed: rdo rje dang ni thod pa 'dzin //
translated: holding a vajra and a skull-cup,

original: gtso bo la ni bdud rtsi stobs //
analyzed: gtso bo la ni bdud rtsi stobs //
translated: offering nectar to the principal one.

original: sku ni bandhu ka ltar dmar //
analyzed: sku ni bandhu ka ltar dmar //
translated: Her body is red like a bandhuka flower,

original: phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan pa'o //
translated: adorned with the five mudras,

original: gnyis med bde ba'i rang bzhin can //
analyzed: gnyis med bde ba'i rang bzhin can //
translated: having the nature of nondual bliss,

original: gsal ba'i sku ni bsgom par bya //
analyzed: gsal ba'i sku ni bsgom par bya //
translated: one should meditate on the radiant body.

original: aom hri: ha ha h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: aom hri: ha ha h'um h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ ha ha hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: snying po'i sngags 'di dang yid kyi dbye bas sbrul 'khyil pa lta bur dmigs la bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: snying po'i sngags 'di dang yid kyi dbye bas sbrul 'khyil pa lta bur dmigs la bzlas par bya'o //
translated: With this essence mantra and mental division, one should visualize it like a coiled snake and do the recitation.

original: de las mthar lus dang ngag dang yid aom a'a: h'um du gyur pas bsdus la chos thams cad bdag med pa'i dang la stong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las mthar lus dang ngag dang yid aom a'a: h'um du gyur pas bsdus la chos thams cad bdag med pa'i dang la stong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: From that, finally, the body, speech, and mind become Om, Ah, and Hum, and are gathered. All phenomena are gathered into the emptiness of selflessness.

original: gang zhig de nyid shes pa ni //
analyzed: gang zhig de nyid shes pa ni //
translated: He who knows that reality

original: deng 'dir rnal 'byor @83b pa nyid du //
analyzed: deng 'dir rnal 'byor @83b pa nyid du //
translated: is a yogin right now,

original: the tshom med de 'di nyid du //
analyzed: the tshom med de 'di nyid du //
translated: without a doubt, in this very life,

original: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin //
translated: is the supreme bliss of the dakini network.

original: sems la rnam gnas rnal 'byor ba //
analyzed: sems la rnam gnas rnal 'byor ba //
translated: The yogin who abides in the mind

original: mya ngan 'das pa mi ston to //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa mi ston to //
translated: does not show nirvana.

original: slob dpon mi bskyod rdo rjes mdzad pa'i man ngag snyan nas snyan du brgyud pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: slob dpon mi bskyod rdo rjes mdzad pa'i man ngag snyan nas snyan du brgyud pa rdzogs so /
translated: The oral lineage of the esoteric instructions composed by the master Akshobhya-vajra is complete.

original: // / pandi ta de nyid dang / lo ts'a ba mar pa chos kyi blo gros kyis bu la ha ri'i dgon par bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / pandi ta de nyid dang / lo ts'a ba mar pa chos kyi blo gros kyis bu la ha ri'i dgon par bsgyur ba'o//
translated: By the pandit himself and the translator Marpa Chokyi Lodro, it was translated in the monastery of Bu-la-ha-ri.
